typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CustomerSource
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		AddressID as integer,
		AddressType as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CustomerAddressSource
source(output(
		CustomerKey as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		AddressID as integer,
		ValidFrom as date,
		ValidTo as date,
		Valid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimCustomerSource
CustomerSource, CustomerAddressSource lookup(CustomerSource@CustomerID == CustomerAddressSource@CustomerID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupKey
NormNames split(isNull(Valid),
	disjoint: false) ~> IdentifyNewCustomers@(NewCustomer, OldCustomer)
DerivedColumn2, DimCustomerSource lookup(DerivedColumn2@CustomerID == DimCustomerSource@CustomerID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupID
IdentifyNewCustomers@NewCustomer derive(Valid = 1,
		SurrogateKey = toString(crc32(CustomerID, AddressID))) ~> DerivedColumn1
IdentifyNewCustomers@OldCustomer, DimCustomerSource exists(IdentifyNewCustomers@NewCustomer@CustomerID == DimCustomerSource@CustomerID,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'none')~> CheckForChanges
CheckForChanges derive(Valid = 1) ~> SetValid1
CheckForChanges derive(Valid = 0) ~> SetValid0
LookupKey derive(CustomerID = toInteger(CustomerSource@CustomerID)) ~> DerivedColumn2
LookupID select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = DerivedColumn2@CustomerID,
		FirstName = CustomerSource@FirstName,
		LastName = CustomerSource@LastName,
		CompanyName = CustomerSource@CompanyName,
		AddressID = CustomerAddressSource@AddressID,
		ModifiedDate = CustomerAddressSource@ModifiedDate,
		CustomerKey,
		ValidFrom,
		ValidTo,
		Valid
	)) ~> NormNames
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		SurrogateKey as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		Address as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		ValidFrom as date,
		ValidTo as date,
		Valid as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		CustomerKey,
		CustomerID,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		CompanyName,
		AddressID,
		ValidFrom,
		ValidTo,
		Valid,
		SurrogateKey
	)) ~> sink1
